text:
Morocco
Morocco: The incredible tifo at the Casablanca derby!
At the Casablanca derby between Raja and Wydad, the fans set fire to the ground and unveiled a superb dragon-shaped tifocen.
03 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Hugo Deloraine



What an incredible sight! In the context of the Casablanca derby, the Mohamed V stadium has experienced an incredible atmosphere. Raja and Wydad faced each other in the Arab Champions Clubs' round of 16 first leg and could not make a 1-1 draw. On the other hand, in the stands, Wydad's supporters took a slight advantage.




A dragon in tifo!





+2 üì∑
Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Indeed, fans of Wydad have deployed a beautiful dragon Tifo making the atmosphere even more incredible.
